00021 #ifndef TRIQS_H5_GROUP_H
00022 #define TRIQS_H5_GROUP_H
00023 #include "./base.hpp"
00024 namespace triqs { namespace h5 {
00029  class group {
00030    H5::Group _g, _parent;
00031    std::string _name_in_parent;
00032    group(H5::Group g, H5::Group parent, std::string name_in_parent) : _g(g), _parent(parent), _name_in_parent(name_in_parent) {} 
00033   public:
00034    group() = default;
00035    group(group const &) = default;
00036    group(H5::Group g) : _g(g) {} 
00037    
00039    group (H5::H5File f) : _g(f.openGroup("/")) {} // can not fail, right ?
00040 
00041    group(std::string const & filename, int flag) { H5::H5File f(filename, H5F_ACC_TRUNC); *this = group(f);}
00042 
00043    group(hid_t id_, bool is_group) {
00044     if (is_group) { _g.setId(id_); }
00045     else { H5::H5File f; f.setId(id_); *this = group(f); }
00046    }
00047 
00048    bool has_parent() const { return _name_in_parent != "";}
00049 
00051    template<typename T>  void write_triqs_hdf5_data_scheme (T const & obj) {  
00052     h5::write_string_attribute( &_g, "TRIQS_HDF5_data_scheme" , get_triqs_hdf5_data_scheme(obj).c_str() ) ;
00053     }   
00055    std::string read_triqs_hdf5_data_scheme() const { return read_string_attribute(&_g, "TRIQS_HDF5_data_scheme") ; }   
00057    bool has_key (std::string const & key) const { return (H5Lexists(_g.getId(), key.c_str(), H5P_DEFAULT)); }
00059    void unlink_key_if_exists(std::string const & key) const { if (this->has_key(key)) _g.unlink(key.c_str()); }
00061    group open_group(std::string const & key) const { 
00062     if (!has_key(key))  TRIQS_RUNTIME_ERROR << "no subgroup "<<key <<" in the group";
00063     group res; 
00064     try { res = group( _g.openGroup(key.c_str()), _g, key) ;} // has a parent 
00065     catch (H5::GroupIException const & e){ TRIQS_RUNTIME_ERROR << "Error in opening the subgroup "<< key <<"\n H5 error message : \n "<< e.getCDetailMsg(); } 
00066     return res;
00067    }
00069    H5::DataSet open_dataset(std::string const & key) const { 
00070     if (!has_key(key))  TRIQS_RUNTIME_ERROR << "no dataset "<<key <<" in the group";
00071     H5::DataSet res;
00072     try { res = _g.openDataSet(key.c_str());} 
00073     catch (H5::GroupIException const & e){ TRIQS_RUNTIME_ERROR << "Error in opening the dataset "<< key <<"\n H5 error message : \n "<< e.getCDetailMsg(); } 
00074     return res;
00075    }
00081    group create_group(std::string const & key, bool delete_if_exists = true) const {
00082     unlink_key_if_exists(key); 
00083     return group(_g.createGroup(key.c_str()),_g, key);
00084    }
00092    template<typename ... Args>
00093     H5::DataSet create_dataset(std::string const & key, Args && ... args) const {
00094      unlink_key_if_exists(key); 
00095      H5::DataSet res;
00096      try{ res = _g.createDataSet(key.c_str(), std::forward<Args>(args)...);} 
00097      catch (H5::GroupIException const & e){ TRIQS_RUNTIME_ERROR << "Error in creating the dataset "<< key <<"\n H5 error message : \n "<< e.getCDetailMsg(); } 
00098      return res;
00099     }
00100 
00102    std::vector<std::string> get_all_subgroup_names(std::string const & key) const;
00103 
00104    std::vector<std::string> get_all_subgroup_names() const {
00105     if (!has_parent()) TRIQS_RUNTIME_ERROR << "Group hdf5 : parent not found";
00106     return group(_parent).get_all_subgroup_names(_name_in_parent);
00107    }
00108 
00110    std::vector<std::string> get_all_dataset_names(std::string const & key) const;
00111 
00112    std::vector<std::string> get_all_dataset_names() const {
00113     if (!has_parent()) TRIQS_RUNTIME_ERROR << "Group hdf5 : parent not found";
00114     return group(_parent).get_all_dataset_names(_name_in_parent);
00115    }
00116 
00117    void write_string_attribute (std::string const & obj_name, std::string const & attr_name, std::string const & value){ 
00118     herr_t err =  H5LTset_attribute_string(_g.getId(),obj_name.c_str(),attr_name.c_str(), value.c_str() ) ;
00119     if (err<0) TRIQS_RUNTIME_ERROR << "Error in setting attribute of "<< obj_name<<" named "<< attr_name << " to " << value; 
00120    }
00121 
00122  };
00123 }}
00124 #endif
